page.title: 12FRISKNEY NEWS
page.content:
Work has started on a new adventure playground near the Village Hall. The project is costing Â£4200. Although 75% of the cost is in the form of a grant the rest is being raised by a group of local people organised by Mr.T.Shaw. It has taken 2 years planning and hard work so far but the project should be finished by the end of 1985.There are also plans for a floodlit hard core court and for the site of the old village pond to be cleaned.Children from school will be helping to plant bulbs and trees around the new pond.
Mrs.I.Lenton and many helpers held a successful sale in the Village Hall on 9.11.85. Over Â£400 was raised to pay for the children's Christmas Party.
